channel.title: Is it possible to, make autoban for players that lets say spam the same read in
channel.description: Hi is it possible lets say if the player says the same thing 4 times it be ipbanned is it any way to do it? Because when the agf bot comes and spams thats so annoying so mabe i can make thing so if he comes and spams 4 times the same thing he will get ipbanned??

item.title: Is it possible to, make autoban for players that lets say spam the same read in
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

make a counter. You would have to make a list for all the words each player has typed. check if the same thing as been sequentially typed for times, and if it has, ipban.

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to, make autoban for players that lets say spam the same read in
